abstracts.cdata!:
This project intends to establish a core
            advisory team within the Ministry of Juba Valley Development
            (MJVD) which would complement technical assistance financed
            by the Kuwait Fund in the fields of irrigated agriculture
            and legal matters.  The core advisory team would also assist
            MJVD in supervising consultant studies and completing
            preparation of the Baardhere Project and its appraisal by
            IDA and other donors.  Further to this, the team would
            assist in formulating plans for project implementation,
            train local staff in preparing and evaluating complex
            projects, and assist in coordinating cofinancing
            arrangements.  In addition, the project would provide the
            continued services of the panel of experts for the Baardhere
            Project; funds for technical assistance, training, vehicles,
            transit accommodation as well as storage, furniture and
            equipment and incremental operating costs.
